Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus looked at the monitor that relayed the visual signal from the comm channel.

Rodimus Prime: Do you really think you can stop me, Maxima? I'll run you down again if I have too. First I'll have my wife back and safe, but then I will give up every bit of honor and rightiousness in my being when I come after you. I will kill everyone bot involved in this plot and I wont do it as a Autobot or a Maximal. I will simply do it for myself.

Rodimus was surprisingly calm while saying this. So calm that it could be frightning because it was obvious that he was honest. He intended to do what he said.


EmprzAnastazia@... wrote:
Maxima watched & listened the exchange between Hydras & Rodimus. Rather amused in the slightest. 

But hearing Rodimus' words of getting Blackstorm back shot a little pain through her. She had indeed changed over time, ever since the Great War. This new beginning was far different than her warrior lifestyle many, many years ago. 

She stepped forward to the console screen, her crimson optics glaring at Rodimus. "I will not let you have her back, Rodimus. Nor will I let you harm Hydras in ANY way!" she growled. So protective had she become. Those she considered here, function, were all she had now. It was beyond programming now, it was instinct. Those here & those in the Ark, she will fight desperately for. 

However, she did tell Kup that she wanted to arrange a meeting of parlay between her & Rodimus, as much as she despised him. She still intended to meet with him concerning the Ark. However, now Nightlight, aka Blackstorm, will be brought into the issue.

They were once again treading on very thin ice, if not very hot lava!
